div.p: ONLINE USER 1: Hey wait a minute... Everyone is at risk for heart disease. All three of them are making high-risk choices. Doesn't that mean they're all going to get heart disease?
ONLINE USER 2: Yeah, I mean, we all know that if you eat crappy food all day and don't go to the gym, you're gonna end up getting sick.
ONLINE USER 3: I don't know though, we all know about that one guy who lives to be 100, and he eats junk food every day.
ONLINE USER 4: I'd like to be like that guy, that's not a bad deal at all. I love cheese and bacon.
